script:
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# voice 3003 "hotengageki_0001"
@方天画戟
主君よ
こないだオレが話したあれ
覚えてるか？

# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@方天画戟
まさかもう忘れたなんて
言わないよなぁ…？

# voice 3003 "hotengageki_0004"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@方天画戟
頼むから
答えてくれよ！

# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@方天画戟
オレは何座かわかるか？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "てんびん座" "select_label_1" "しし座" "select_label_2" "おとめ座" "select_label_3"
オレは何座かわかるか？

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
